name: Novels: Choices Do Matter
description:
What you can expect with Novels:

- Build a romance with any of your favorite characters
- Customize your Main Hero
- New dress options available in every chapter
- Your choices do matter and really affect our stories
- Brand new exclusive stories

Like to read books but want something fresh and modern? Like to play interactive stories but tired of the same old template-based stories? Try Novels: Choices do matter! We are a new word in the world of interactive storytelling. All our stories are written by meticulously selected authors who had to pass through our demanding board of experts. Every story in our collection is Exclusive, you will never have that feeling of "I've seen that somewhere else already"! You directly control the flow of the story. Your choices do matter and do really affect the plot, so choose carefully how to react and what to do in different situations!

We bring you new stories and new chapters on a regular basis. Right now you have a great opportunity to affect the course of development of Novels! Your suggestions are welcomed at suggest@ayist.games! Write to us what genre you are interested in and we will choose the most popular genre for our next upcoming book!

Stories you can currently read in Novels:

SCHOOL SECRETS: casual witness. A story about American high school student Ellie, who becomes a casual witness of something not completely legal. This involves someone she thinks she loves... Help her to ensure her future and find her true love!

KITCHEN SHOOT OUT: recipes of love. Mary is a journalist and pursues her dream of working for a famous tabloid. She gets the job but her first assignment is more like an espionage mission. Dirty secrets, phantoms, strange TV show, will she solve it all and find someone to support her in this situation and possibly more?

FATEFUL BEACHES. Lili comes to the Dominican Republic at last! Beautiful beaches, handsome guys, warm sea! This all sounds like a dream! But dreams tend to turn into nightmares... Will she find a way through it? Can she enjoy her holidays even after she loses everything? Will she find love and turn a nightmare back into a pleasant dream? This is all up to you!
